description: Standardized 10mm ammunition with a brass jacketed projectile.  For as long as you can remember bullets like these have been used for military, law enforcement, and civilian use.  Being caseless, these cannot be disassembled or reloaded.

Standardized 10mm ammunition with a hollow point projectile.  While they have inferior penetration to FMJ rounds, their expansion slightly increases stopping power against unarmed targets and reduces overpenetration.  Being caseless, these cannot be disassembled or reloaded.
